actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to assure that weather modification activities and the collection of hydrometeorological information necessary to the management of water resources can be conducted in conjunction with the management and administration of wilderness and other Federal lands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretaries of Agriculture and of the Interior to permit the conduct of weather modification activities within, over, or which may affect areas which are part of the national wilderness preservation system or other Federal lands.

titles.title: A bill to assure that weather modification activities and the collection of hydrometeorological information necessary to the management of water resources can be conducted in conjunction with the management and administration of wilderness and other Federal lands.
